settings.description: Image plane position (relative to optical axis)
settings.name: f_image

settings.description: Secondary mirror offset (relative to optical axis)
settings.name: delta_sec

settings.description: Primary mirror clear diameter (use full mirror surface)
settings.name: d_clear
commentsinfile
settings.value:
Conic Mirror On Axis 3D

On axis conic mirror. The mirror surface may be either concave or convex. A central hole may or may not be present. A clear aperture which is smaller than the mirror surface diameter can be specified.

settings.name: labelinfile
settings.value: Specify mirror angle and minor axis diameter

settings.name: commentsinfile
settings.value:
Elliptical Planar Mirror 3D

Elliptical planar mirror. The mirror angle may be specified directly or in terms of the major and minor axis diameters.

settings.name: commentsinfile
settings.value:
Circular Planar Annulus

Circular planar annulus with negligible thickness.

settings.description: Show as variant in part library
settings.name: partvariant

settings.description: Keep selections by default in instances
settings.name: keepselininstances

settings.description: Avoid inverted elements by curving interior domain elements
settings.name: curvedinterior
